cause.description:
Physicians for Social Responsibility is a nationwide organization of 32,000 members with 31 chapters focused on responding to the dangers of proliferation of and reliance on nuclear weapons and global warming.
1. Nuclear weapons must never be used.
2. Conflict resolution and diplomacy should be preferred over force in U.S. foreign and security policy.
3. Global warming must be stopped.
cause.mission: Guided by the values and expertise of medicine and public health, Physicians for Social Responsibility works to protect human life from the gravest threats to health and survival.
cause.name: Physicians for Social Responsibility
